amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, extends the visa waiver pilot program until April 30, 2000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 3 in the Congressional Record of March 24, 1998, to change the authoriziation for the visa waiver pilot program from 1999 to 2000.

action.text: Smith (TX) amendment (A001) modified by unanimous consent. The modification makes a technical correction to the amendment text.
On agreeing to the Smith (TX) amendment (A001) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
